mapper.sql: id as id, code as code, name as name, type as type, level as level, user as user, contact as contact, customer_id as customerId, lifecycle as lifecycle, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, operator_id as operatorId, pic_mobile_telephone as picMobileTelephone, country_id as countryId, province_id as provinceId, city_id as cityId, address as address, zip_code as zipCode, email as email, villages_towns_id as villagesTownsId, district_id as districtId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_supplier ( id, code , name , type , level , user , contact , customer_id , lifecycle , create_time , last_modify_time , operator_id , pic_mobile_telephone , country_id , province_id , city_id , address , zip_code , email , villages_towns_id , district_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{code,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{name,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{type,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{level,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{user,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contact,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{customerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{picMobileTelephone,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{countryId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{provinceId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{cityId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{address,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{zipCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{email,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{villagesTownsId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{districtId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_supplier SET code = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , type = #{type,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , level = #{level,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , user = #{user,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , contact = #{contact,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , customer_id = #{customerId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
